tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project structure with necessary directories and files
tasks.details: Create the project folder structure with src, public, and config directories. Set up package.json with React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and required dependencies. Configure TypeScript if needed.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify folder structure and package.json contents match expected setup

tasks.title: Implement Color Palette
tasks.description: Apply brand colors to the UI components
tasks.details: Create a Tailwind CSS config file with the provided color palette. Apply color classes to buttons, headers, and background elements. Ensure color contrast meets accessibility standards.
tasks.testStrategy: Check color application across all UI elements and verify contrast ratios

tasks.title: Create Navigation Component
tasks.description: Develop a responsive navigation bar with links to all sections
tasks.details: Implement a sticky navigation bar with dropdown menus for services. Add scroll-to-section functionality. Ensure mobile responsiveness with hamburger menu.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify navigation works across devices and sections are correctly linked

tasks.title: Design Hero Section
tasks.description: Implement the cinematic hero section with video background and CTAs
tasks.details: Embed a video loop as background. Add the tagline and buttons for 'View Our Work' and 'Let’s Talk'. Implement hover effects for buttons using Tailwind and Framer Motion.
tasks.testStrategy: Confirm video plays correctly and buttons trigger expected actions

tasks.title: Implement Philosophy Block
tasks.description: Create the scroll-animated reveal for the three-word philosophy section
tasks.details: Use Framer Motion to create a scroll-triggered animation. Display the words 'Creative. Meaningful. Effective.' with a fade-in effect as the user scrolls.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify animation triggers on scroll and text appears correctly

tasks.title: Build Featured Projects Carousel
tasks.description: Develop a responsive carousel for showcasing featured projects
tasks.details: Create a carousel component with thumbnail previews, project names, and short descriptions. Implement click-to-preview functionality using YouTube embeds or modals.
tasks.testStrategy: Test carousel navigation and ensure project details are displayed correctly

tasks.title: Create Client Types Section
tasks.description: Implement icons and labels for different client types
tasks.details: Design and layout icons for Startups, Corporates, Agencies, Govt, MSMEs. Add hover effects and labels. Ensure responsiveness across devices.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify icons and labels are visible and interactive on all screen sizes

tasks.title: Develop Video Services Section
tasks.description: Implement the service blocks and how we work timeline
tasks.details: Create an icon grid for video services. Design a visual timeline for the 4-step process: Script → Shoot → Edit → Deliver. Add a showreel embed with autoplay on scroll.
tasks.testStrategy: Check service blocks and timeline display correctly with autoplay functionality

tasks.title: Implement Packages Section
tasks.description: Create pricing cards for video production packages
tasks.details: Design and layout pricing cards for Starter, Advanced, and Campaign Film Packs. Include CTA buttons for enquire and let’s talk. Ensure pricing is clearly visible.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify pricing cards display correctly and CTAs function as expected

tasks.title: Set Up Contact Form and Social Links
tasks.description: Develop the contact form and integrate social media links
tasks.details: Create a form with fields for name, email, mobile, project type, and message. Integrate with Brevo/Formspree/Hubspot. Add WhatsApp, Instagram, and Calendly links.
tasks.testStrategy: Test form submission and verify social links open correctly
